Title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
HTML:
We are Kaizen Gaming

Kaizen Gaming, the team powering Betano, is one of the biggest GameTech companies in the world, operating in 17 markets with 2 brands (Betano & Stoiximan).

We always aim to leverage cutting-edge technology, providing the best experience to our millions of customers who trust us for their entertainment.

We are a diverse team of more than 2.500 Kaizeners, from 40+ nationalities spreading across 3 continents. Our #oneteam is proud to be among the Best Workplaces in Europe and certified Great Place to Work across our offices. Here, there’ll be no average day for you. Ready to Press Play on Potential?

Let's start with the role

At Kaizen, we aim to leverage the capabilities offered by modern AI algorithms to continuously improve our product and business. Kaizen’s AI department consists of product, platform and research teams and lies at the core of that mission. We develop AI products for various applications, ranging from detection of fraudulent activity to personalized gaming recommendations, and from AI-powered co-pilots to CRM optimizations.

We build our teams to be self-driven, autonomous and cross-functional. Within these teams, you will have the opportunity to work with Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, Data Engineers, Data Analysts, Product Owners and Agile Delivery Leads.

As a Machine Learning Software Engineer, you will focus on delivering robust and scalable Machine Learning pipelines and you will support the operationalization of Machine Learning models.

As a Machine Learning Engineer your will:

  • Design, develop and maintain scalable model training and inference pipelines in a distributed production environment;
  • Design, develop and maintain microservices in Python that host and serve ML models on production;
  • Design, develop and maintain internal tools that enable CI/CD/CT, performant feature engineering, experiment tracking, data and model versioning.

What you’ll bring

  • Ηands-on experience in software development using Python on a production environment;
  • Good understanding of:
    • Software system design;
    • The ML project lifecycle;
    • MLOps concepts and tools such as MLflow or Kubeflow;
    • ML algorithms and models.
    • Experience with cloud providers like Microsoft Azure or AWS;
    • Experience with PySpark and Databricks.

    #Machine Learning (ML) #MLOps #AIOps #Software Engineering

    Kaizen Gaming Perks

    • 🕑 Hybrid model of working;
    • 🏃 A buddy will support you with your onboarding;
    • 💸 Competitive salary package and bonus scheme;
    • 👩‍⚕️ Health and life insurance for you and your family;
    • 💰 Monthly meal allowance
    • ⭐Developmental 360° feedback framework;
    • 📚 Unlimited access to Udemy & continuous training
    • 🚗 Commuting allowance



    Recruitment Privacy Notice

    Regarding the data you share with us, you may find and read our recruitment privacy notice here.

Title: CELONIS DATA SCIENTIST (HYBRID)
Description:
Portuguese company hires for remote/hybrid work

CANDIDATES MUST LIVE IN LISBON/PORTUGAL

FLUENT PORTUGUESE AND ENGLISH (B2+)

SEND CV IN ENGLISH

Description


What we are looking for / tasks associated with the position:


We are looking for an Expert in Data & Process Mining, with strong specialization in the use of the Celonis platform with an approach focused on simplifying and optimizing processes, with a strong emphasis on automation and self-service solutions.

This profile will be essential to identify inefficiencies in the processes that support our Digital & IT operations, propose and implement improvements, and ensure that our operations are aligned with best practices and market trends.

This is a strategic role that will have a direct impact on operational efficiency, providing the opportunity to work on innovative and high-impact initiatives.

IMPORTANT: partners must only present CVs of profiles that already have proven experience in Celonis technological implementations (proofs of concept or value will not be considered as proven experience)

The Candidate Must Be Able To


Functionally characterize events related to Digital & IT operations for discovery and analysis in Celonis;
Technically specify the collection and modeling of event data, ensuring its effective integration into the Celonis platform;
Explore and model data structures (using SQL), for optimization and preparation for Process Mining;
Load data and configure the base analytical project in Celonis;
Specify requirements for creating dashboards, ensuring that they meet monitoring and analysis needs;
Design and develop dashboards on the Celonis platform, ensuring a clear and actionable visualization of data;
Perform detailed analyzes using advanced Process Mining techniques to identify inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement in processes;
Apply practical experience in Celonis technology implementation initiatives, ensuring the effective delivery of tangible value to the Client.
Must have:
CELONIS Certification
Proven experience in technological implementations with CELONIS
SQL
Nice to have: -
Top Skills:
Proven experience in technological implementations with CELONIS
Preparation of business process reports
Execution of corrections and improvements to the Celonis platform
Technical functional analyzes to include new processes in Celonis
Years of Experience: up to 9 years as a Data Scientist
Type of project: Development
Hybrid Position

Title: Data Scientist (m/f/d)
HTML:
A QiBit procura Data Scientists para integração num Tech Hub internacional e estamos à procura dos melhores especialistas em tecnologia para se juntarem aos centros de excelência e à comunidade internacional do nosso cliente, uma prestigiada Big4, para desenvolverem soluções únicas e inovadoras nos mais variados e complexos projetos de transformação.


  • Formato Híbrido: 3 dias em escritório, 2 em casa;
  • Contrato Permanente;
  • Pacote de benefícios competitivo.


O teu dia a dia e responsabilidades vão ser compostos por:


  • Analise de dados em várias tecnologias, SQL e No-SQL;
  • Desenho, implementação, e monitorização de pipelines ETL;
  • Criação de processos para tratamento de dados (data profiling, cleansing, masking);
  • Desenho e implementação de soluções real-time analytics;
  • Desenho e implementação de soluções Big Data;
  • Desenho e Implementação de soluções data-driven distribuídas com recurso a tecnologias Cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP);
  • Colaborar com vários stakeholders na definição, tratamento de dados e implementação de modelos avançados de Machine Learning.
  • Garantir a coordenação entre equipas técnicas e funcionais no âmbito de projetos de dados;


És tu quem procuramos:


  • Formação superior nas áreas de Engenharia ou similares;
  • Conhecimento da língua Inglesa (oral e escrita) e disponibilidade para viajar;
  • Entre 2 a 6 Anos de experiência profissional em projetos de Data;
  • Conhecimento de processos de desenvolvimento de software;
  • Experiência com metodologias Agile;
  • Conhecimentos de linguagens SQL / No SQL;
  • Conhecimentos em Python;
  • Experiência profissional em soluções ETL (exemplos, Azure Data Fabric, AWS Glue, Snowflake, SSIS, IBM DataStage) (preferencial);
  • Experiência em soluções da Data Visualization (exemplos, Power BI, Tableau);
  • Experiência profissional com Data Warehouses / Data Lakes;
  • Conhecimento das soluções Cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) orientadas a arquiteturas de dados distribuídos;
  • Experiência profissional em soluções/tecnologias Big Data (exemplos, Kafka, Hadoop, Spark, ELK, MongoDB) (preferencial);
  • Orientação para o cliente e para resultados;
  • Comunicação, trabalho em equipa, resolução de problemas e capacidade analítica.


Desenvolve uma carreira à tua medida


  • Num contexto de trabalho diverso que permite um desenvolvimento e aprendizagem contínuos
  • Através de um plano de desenvolvimento de carreira personalizado (skills/ oportunidades técnicas e funcionais), adequado ao momento, às tuas necessidades e objetivos
  • Participando em projetos nacionais e internacionais, com dimensão e impacto relevante nesta área de especialização
  • Acesso ilimitado às maiores plataformas de aprendizagem online (Linkedin Learning e Udemy).
  • Oportunidade de formações e certificações nas mais recentes tecnologias, nomeadamente em tecnologias Cloud.


Se este é o teu perifl, submete a tua candidatura.

Title: ILI.Digital - Machine Learning / NLP Engineer
Description:
ILI Digital is currently hiring a Machine Learning / NLP Engineer to join their team

ILI.DIGITAL isn't just a software company — their team are rebels in the business world, challenging the status quo, embracing innovation, and transforming corporates into dynamic entrepreneurs. Since their beginning, they've been at the forefront of innovation movements, pioneering digital transformations, and harnessing cutting-edge technologies to create customized, empowering, and value-added software solutions.

They are problem-solvers in software development, providing tailor-made solutions for their clients. ILI.DIGITAL is thus one of the top 5% of the best-rated employers in Germany and is now setting up a dynamic new hub in Portugal.

Ready to elevate your career and make an impact with ILI.DIGITAL?

About the role: They are seeking a dedicated Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for Natural Language Processing (NLP) and data science to join their Data Science/AI team. As a key team member, you will play a crucial role in developing and deploying cutting-edge NLP and machine-learning solutions to solve complex business problems. Your expertise will drive advancements in data-driven decision-making processes and contribute to the success of their organization.

Your Responsibilities Will Include


Develop and implement state-of-the-art machine learning models.
Design and build scalable and efficient data pipelines for processing and transforming large volumes of textual data, ensuring data quality and availability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Data Scientists and Software Engineers, to integrate NLP and machine learning solutions into our products and services.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in NLP and machine learning research and apply best practices to improve existing models and algorithms.
Utilize cloud-based platforms and infrastructure to deploy, monitor, and maintain NLP and machine learning models in production environments.
Conduct performance analysis and optimization of NLP and machine learning algorithms, fine-tuning models for accuracy and efficiency.
Collaborate with stakeholders to define project requirements, objectives, and success criteria for NLP and machine learning initiatives.


Requirements


Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in Natural Language Processing.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, along with experience in deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.
Strong background in machine learning, generative AI, and real-world AI applications
Experience with large-scale distributed training on GPUs or TPUs
Hands-on experience building and deploying NLP models in real-world applications, including text classification, named entity recognition, and language modeling.
Familiar with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) for deploying NLP and machine learning solutions.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
Strong communication and teamwork skills.
Good communication skills in English


Want to know more? Get in touch with us 👇
Show more

Title: Senior Google Data Scientist (Lisbon)
HTML:
Senior Google Data Scientist

Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

YOUR ROLE

We are looking for motivated Senior Google Data Scientist to join our teams in Lisbon.

In This Role You Will Be Responsible For

  • Collaborate with cross-functions teams to identify business challenges and opportunities for leveraging data-driven solutions;
  • Design, develop and deploy machine learning models and algorithms on Google Cloud Platform to address complex business problems;
  • Utilize Google Doc AI to extract actionable insights from unstructured data sources such as documents, imagens and text;
  • Perform data analysis, visualization and interpretation to communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders;
  • Stay updated on the latest advancements in machine learning, AI and cloud technologies to continuosly improve our analytical capabilities;

YOUR PROFILE

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics or a related field;
  • Proven experience as a Data Scientist (at least 5 years) with expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis and data visualization;
  • Strong proficiency in Google Cloud Platform services such as BigQuery, AI Platform, Dataflow and Cloud Storage;
  • Hands-on experience with Google Doc AI or similar natural language processing (NLP);
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R ou Java;
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders;
  • Certifications are a plus;

WHAT YOU'LL LOVE ABOUT WORKING HERE?

  • At Capgemini Portugal we have a flexible and dynamic work environment. Flexibility enables a better work-life balance and gives more flexibility to the employee to manage the working hours, as well if he works at the office or remotely, according with the company’s hybrid work policy;
  • We have local programs that promote people growth, reskill and new skills development (Career Acceleration Programs);
  • We promote an empowering environment with autonomy and peers' relationships among the top scores of our Monthly Employees' feedback;
  • Next to this, we also offer an attractive compensation package and benefits such as Health and Life insurance, as well as Referral program with bonuses for talent recommendations and other fringe benefits according with our partnerships in force.
  • Capgemini Portugal is an equal opportunity employer. We promote equality and dignity in all aspects of recruitment and employment, as well as employment offers and promotions made according with competence and ability or performance, respectively.

About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.

Get the future you want | www.capgemini.com

Apply now!

Title: ML Data scientist
Description:
Our client is seeking fora highly skilled and experienced Senior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. If you have a passion for data, enjoy uncovering actionable insights, and are adept at creating advanced models, we want to hear from you.

Responsibilities


Develop data pipelines for efficient ETL processes and source relevant datasets
Analyse and interpret data to find actionable insights and trends
Enhance data by integrating third-party information and improving collection procedures
Design and refine machine learning models, including the use of LLMs
Develop and implement natural language processing (NLP) models for text analysis, sentiment analysis, and other language-based insights
Create recommendation systems for tasks like fraud detection and time series analysis
Implement A/B testing procedures and automated scoring systems
Conduct ad-hoc analyses and present findings to stakeholders
Ensure the effectiveness of models, including ML and NLP models, through testing and refinements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions


Requirements


5+ years of experience as a Data Scientist
Proficiency in R, Python, SQL, Java, and familiarity with Scala or C++
Experience with data manipulation tools like SQL, Excel, pandas
Strong knowledge of machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and ML methods
Solid background in statistics and data visualization tools
Proficiency in development tools like Jupyter Notebook, PyCharm, and Git
Familiarity with cloud platforms, big data technologies, and NoSQL databases

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
CONTEXT

Richemont owns some of the world’s leading luxury goods Maisons, with strengths in jewellery, fine watches & premium accessories, including Cartier, Van Cleef & Arpels, Montblanc, Roger Dubuis, Vacheron Constantin, etc.

Richemont has a strong ambition to transform its business model towards New Retail. Part of this transformation is the Group Data Office that, among others, delivers Analytics & Data Science projects for the different Maisons.

The Analytics & Data Science team, belonging to “Group Data Office”, supports this vision by developing analytics and data science use cases, defining best practices across the group, and industrializing analytics & data science solutions. This team is recruiting a Senior Data Scientist to work under the Lead Data Scientist.

Responsibilities


Design & develop complex ML-driven approaches to resolve business problems .
Gather requirements and effectively communicate developed solution to the Business.
Partner with Machine Learning Engineers, Analytics Engineers & IT to deliver solutions.


Academic Background


Graduate in Master program in Engineering, Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields.


Skills & Experience


Proficient in Python programming language & data-related libraries (6 years +)
Extensive experience in Data Science & Machine Learning (6 years +) in a large variety of topics
Good knowledge in Statistics & SQL
Professional experience in Google Cloud Platform or other cloud platform (2 years +)
Experience in Vertex AI is a plus
Experience in Git + Agile Development is a plus.


Desired Personal Skills


Autonomous, proactive & curious with a strong sense of ownership
Proficiency in English is a must: Strong communication skills, ability to explain complex topics to top-level management.
Quick-learner, able to comprehend & resolve complex problems.
Pragmatic mindset to problem solving, and an ability to think critically and objectively.
Ease to collaborate in multicultural and multifunctional environments.


Show more
HTML:
CONTEXT

Richemont owns some of the world’s leading luxury goods Maisons, with strengths in jewellery, fine watches & premium accessories, including Cartier, Van Cleef & Arpels, Montblanc, Roger Dubuis, Vacheron Constantin, etc.

Richemont has a strong ambition to transform its business model towards New Retail. Part of this transformation is the Group Data Office that, among others, delivers Analytics & Data Science projects for the different Maisons.

The Analytics & Data Science team, belonging to “Group Data Office”, supports this vision by developing analytics and data science use cases, defining best practices across the group, and industrializing analytics & data science solutions. This team is recruiting a Senior Data Scientist to work under the Lead Data Scientist.

Responsibilities

  • Design & develop complex ML-driven approaches to resolve business problems .
  • Gather requirements and effectively communicate developed solution to the Business.
  • Partner with Machine Learning Engineers, Analytics Engineers & IT to deliver solutions.

Academic Background

  • Graduate in Master program in Engineering, Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields.

Skills & Experience

  • Proficient in Python programming language & data-related libraries (6 years +)
  • Extensive experience in Data Science & Machine Learning (6 years +) in a large variety of topics
  • Good knowledge in Statistics & SQL
  • Professional experience in Google Cloud Platform or other cloud platform (2 years +)
  • Experience in Vertex AI is a plus
  • Experience in Git + Agile Development is a plus.

Desired Personal Skills

  • Autonomous, proactive & curious with a strong sense of ownership
  • Proficiency in English is a must: Strong communication skills, ability to explain complex topics to top-level management.
  • Quick-learner, able to comprehend & resolve complex problems.
  • Pragmatic mindset to problem solving, and an ability to think critically and objectively.
  • Ease to collaborate in multicultural and multifunctional environments.

Title: Java Developer (Lisbon)
HTML:
Java Developer

Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

YOUR ROLE

We are looking for Java Developers to join our teams in Lisbon.

In This Role You Will Be Responsible For

  • Design, Architecture, Development, and Implementation of CI/CD;
  • Elaboration of documentation;
  • Support and Troubleshooting.

YOUR PROFILE

  • BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
  • At least 2 years of experience;
  • Experience with Java Frameworks
  • Spring Framework, JPA, Hibernate, Docker, Kubernetes;
  • Knowledge of Angular or Kotlin;
  • English fluent;
  • Embody Capgemini’s values of Boldness, Trust, and Team Spirit, promoting collaboration, proactive problem-solving, and high-quality software delivery.

What You’ll Love About Working Here

  • At Capgemini Portugal we have a flexible and dynamic work environment. Flexibility enables a better work-life balance and gives more flexibility to the employee to manage the working hours, as well if he works at the office or remotely, according with the company’s hybrid work policy;
  • We have local programs that promote people growth, reskill and new skills development (Career Acceleration Programs);
  • We promote an empowering environment with autonomy and peers' relationships among the top scores of our Monthly Employees' feedback; Next to this, we also offer an attractive compensation package and benefits such as Health and Life insurance, as well as Referral program with bonuses for talent recommendations and other fringe benefits according with our partnerships in force.
  • Capgemini Portugal is an equal opportunity employer. We promote equality and dignity in all aspects of recruitment and employment, as well as employment offers and promotions made according with competence and ability or performance, respectively.

About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
We are One Team. We make it happen. We are Unstoppable.

A Babel é uma empresa multinacional que fornece serviços tecnológicos orientados para apoiar grandes empresas dos setores da Administração Pública, Banca, Seguros, Indústria e Telecomunicações no seu processo de Transformação Digital.

Estamos em Portugal, Espanha, Marrocos, Colômbia, Costa Rica, República Dominicana, Estados Unidos, Chile, México e Panamá. Uma parte essencial da missão da Babel é oferecer aos colaboradores uma carreira profissional de longa duração, pois acreditamos no trabalho em equipa, nas pessoas e na sua força quando elas combinam a sua paixão com o seu talento.

Nosso plano estratégico

Na Babel, estamos entusiasmados com o progresso do nosso Plano Marte 2025. O nosso objetivo é atingir um volume de negócios de 300 milhões de euros e alcançar um EBITDA de 36 milhões de euros com uma força de trabalho de 5.000 babelievers em todo o mundo! O trabalho árduo e o empenho da equipa estão a dar frutos e estamos no bom caminho para atingir estes objetivos, o que reflete a solidez e a visão da nossa organização.

Olhando para o futuro, já projetámos o novo plano estratégico Hyperspace 2029, um desafio ainda maior, que promete ser uma viagem emocionante, cheia de oportunidades para crescer e desenvolver-se profissionalmente. Chegar aos 1000 milhões de faturação, um desafio que estamos confiantes que, com a colaboração e o talento dos nossos colaboradores, será mais uma história de sucesso que escreveremos juntos.

Local de Trabalho:

Formato de trabalho:

Hybrid

Função:

Python Developer

O que procuramos:


Licenciatura ou Mestrado em Engenharia Informática, ou similar;
Experiência profissional superior a 4 anos como Python Developer;
Experiência comprovada com Bibliotecas Python, como Numpy e Pandas;
Vasto conhecimento de Programação Orientada a Objetos;
Domínio da língua Inglesa (obrigatório).

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Lisbon)
Description:
Hi there!

We are Capgemini Engineering. A brand part of the Capgemini Group.

We have the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, diversity, inclusion, a purpose of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can learn more about Capgemini Engineering here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZ0Z6PjdnQo.

You can help us to achieve our mission!

Now, we are part of Capgemini Group and we have more than 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries, and we work with sectors such as aeronautics, automotive, communications, energy, life sciences, software & internet, space & defense and consumer products.

Your Mission

Capgemini Engineering is constantly growing and attentive to market opportunities and in search of the best professionals to join its team. We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team, on a hybrid format, with the possibility of participating in many interesting and cutting-edge projects through the whole life-cycle.

Your Role

A Senior Data Scientist exhibits expert-level understanding and execution of data science projects with a strategic impact on the organization. Responsibilities include:


Leadership and mentorship to teams of data scientists and analysts, guiding them to success on intricate data science initiatives.
Defining the strategic direction for data science projects, ensuring alignment with business goals and objectives.
Conducting advanced analysis of complex datasets to derive profound insights, forecast trends, and pinpoint opportunities for improvement.
Designing, implementing, and evaluating advanced statistical models and machine learning algorithms to address high-impact business challenges.
Lead the integration of big data technologies and advanced analytics solutions into business processes, driving innovation in methodologies and practices.
Establishing best practices for data management, quality, and governance to ensure the integrity and reliability of data science outputs.
Effectively communicating complex analytical concepts and the value of data science initiatives to stakeholders at all levels, including executive leadership.
Advocating for a culture of data-driven decision-making and continuous learning within the organization.


Your Profile


7 or more years of experience in data science and analytics, with a proven track record of leading successful data science projects.
Proficiency of programming languages, including Python and SQL, along with advanced libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow or Pytorch.
Possess a deep understanding of statistical analysis, machine learning, predictive modeling, and advanced algorithmic problem-solving.
Showcase extensive experience in data visualization and interpretation, translating complex results into actionable insights.
Exhibit leadership experience with the ability to inspire, guide, and mentor team members to achieve exceptional results.
Possess technical domain knowledge in cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) or big data technologies (Spark).
Have exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with fluency in English and the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.


What we Offer

Our Famous Atmosphere


There’s always someone happy to start the day with a cup of coffee with you – even virtually!
We are a big company with a unique atmosphere – we make friendships, share important moments, and… simply like each other!


A Lot Of Benefits


Referral bonuses for recommending your friends to Capgemini Engineering.
Continuous training on Next*
Offices in a great location
Participation in international projects
Integration in a multinational company
Career Evolution


Location:


Lisbon full-time and hybrid


We inform you that our recruitment process is 100% remote

Apply Now!
Show more

Title: Python Developer
Description:
About The Job


The Risk Systems team is part of BNP Paribas’ RISK function, whose mission is to support the definition of the risk appetite and risk decision-making process of the Group
Your primary focus will be the development of the core framework used for data integration and calculation of market and counterparty risk metrics
With over 200 members worldwide, RISK Systems works in a fully Scaled Agile setup and you will be part of a team of 8 members following SAFE agile practices, working closely with other locations, in a multicultural environment
Innovation is also key to RISK Systems and you will have the opportunity to collaborate in cross-team innovation projects and propose initiatives aligned with our top innovation priorities: Artificial Intelligence, Development Languages, Process Efficiency & Automation and Knowledge Sharing

Your Main Activities Are


Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable and reliable Python code
Rapidly prototyping solutions to quickly prove/disprove new concepts
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications
Incrementally deliver applications to meet dynamic customer requirements
Resolve incidents in a production environment
Collaborate with different stakeholders in the solution of problems and blockages

Profile and Skills to Success


Bachelor Degree in Computer Science / Engineering / Physics / Finance / Statistics / Mathematics or related
Years of relevant experience
Advanced level of English, both written and oral
Knowledge in
Python
SQL and any industry standard relational database
Fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
Ability to collaborate / teamwork
Creativity and innovation / problem solving
Decision making

Why joining BNP Paribas?


Leading banking institution


BNP Paribas is the European Union’s leading bank, and key player in international banking. It operates in 63 countries and has nearly 183.000 employees, including more than 146.000 in Europe.


Our presence in Portugal


In Portugal since 1985, BNP Paribas today has more than 8.700 employees, distributed across the Group's 10 business entities established in the country. Its presence also extends to 11 excellence centres providing value-added services to various countries where the BNP Paribas Group also operates.


International reach


Thanks To Its International Presence And Regular And Close Collaboration Among Its Different Entities, BNP Paribas Has The Resources To Support All Clients With Financing, Investment, Savings And Protection Solutions That Help Make Their Projects a Success. BNP Paribas Holds Key Positions In Its Three Core Operating Divisions


Retail Banking, a division that brings together all of the Group’s retail activities and specialised business lines;
Investment & Protection Services that include specialised businesses offering a wide range of savings, investment and protection services;
Corporate & Institutional Banking division that offers tailored financial solutions for corporate and institutional clients.
Diversity and Inclusion commitment


BNP Paribas is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.


Commitment towards work/life balance


At BNP Paribas we care about our employees wellbeing and promote a culture of good integration between work and rest. We believe our employees have rich personal lives outside of work, being fundamental to be disconnected from work to recharge both physically and mentally. Only through this balance we may all be at our best while working.


Remote Working Conditions


At BNP Paribas, we embrace a Smart Working framework based on trust, autonomy and collaboration. Within this framework, eligible employees can benefit from flexible remote working modalities adapted to our hybrid working environment. To guarantee a comfortable and efficient working set-up, eligible employees are provided with both the office and home equipment, are entitled to an equipment allowance and can benefit from exclusive partnerships to purchase additional equipment at reduced prices.

To find out more on why you should join BNP Paribas visit https://bnpp.lk/why-BNP-Paribas-Portugal


Please note that only applications submitted in English will be considered.
In case you are selected for this role, further documentation will be requested to support your hiring process.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
SENIOR MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER

CONTEXT

Richemont has a strong ambition to transform its business model towards New Retail. Part of this transformation is the Group Data Office that, among others, delivers Analytics & Data Science projects for the different Maisons.

The Analytics & Data Science team, belonging to “Group Data Office”, supports this vision by developing analytics and data science use cases, defining best practices across the group, and industrializing analytics & data science solutions. This team is recruiting a Senior ML Engineer to work under the Lead Machine Learning Engineer.

HOW WILL YOU MAKE AN IMPACT?


Develop components of the analytics and machine learning platform, including: infrastructure modules, reusable components for AI/Analytics applications or architecture templates
Industrialize, maintain and improve AI and analytics solutions in Google Cloud Platform
Manage the infrastructure with special focus on reliance, security and scalability
Partner with Analytics Engineers, Data Scientists, Infrastructure & Data Engineers for the project delivery


HOW WILL YOU EXPERIENCE SUCESS WITH US?


Graduate in Master program in Engineering, Data Science, or related fields or equivalent professional experience
Proficient in Python programming & SQL (5 years or more)
Practical experience in MLOPs (3-5 years or more)
Professional experience in Google Cloud Platform (2 years +)
Practical experience with infrastructure as a code, ideally Terraform (1 years+)
Knowledge of Data Engineering principles
Knowledge of REST API and microservices
A dynamic, innovative & pragmatic mindset to problem solving, and an ability to think critically and objectively, both independently & within a team
Proactive, curious and autonomous with a strong sense of ownership and always on the look to improve the current solutions
Strong communication skills, English is a must, ease to collaborate in multicultural and multifunctional environments
Experience in Vertex AI and DBT is a plus


HOW DO WE KEEP YOU SMILING?

This is a fantastic opportunity to join the leader of luxury digital distribution as a builder of excellence for such a transformational practice. The business impact up for grasps, the AI use cases and diversity of stakeholders will make it rich, fast-paced, multicultural and fun for the right candidate.

Your Journey With Us

 1.    If your application is selected, we will reach out to you ASAP for an informal introductory call.


    The next step from there would be interviews with the Head of Data Science, Lead Machine Learning Engineer and our HR Business Partner.


 

LEARN MORE ABOUT LIFE AT RICHEMONT AND OUR MAISONS BELOW

 https://www.linkedin.com/company/richemont/ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtcz344eqsWvggwOnq-yljg

#RICHEMONT #REVEALTHEEXCEPTIONNAL

Title: think-cell - C++ Developer
Description:
think-cell is recruiting a C++ Developer

About

think-cell is a fast-paced software company in Berlin, Germany, with a focus on developing graphics products that stand out from the crowd. More than 1,000,000 users worldwide rely on think-cell's software for their daily business as it makes creating graphical presentations so much easier, faster, and more enjoyable. Among their customers are many renowned consulting companies and large international corporations.

They do not have to make compromises with regard to code quality and beauty, because think-cell is highly profitable. They are willing to go the extra mile of developing sophisticated algorithms and refining their user interface, and they are proud of their many happy customers. The fact that the company is owned and managed by seasoned computer scientists certainly contributes to a working environment that makes exceptional developers come and stay.

About The Role

think-cell is looking for smart, creative developers with a solid theoretical background. Their team of developers consists of those with 15+ years of commercial experience in various fields, to fresh graduates in Computer Science, Physics, and Mathematics. A university degree or work experience with C++, together with a fresh and creative problem-solving approach would be an excellent combination for this role.

As all of their recruitment steps are task-based, the selection is based on the skills demonstrated during their tests. You will work largely independently and will be responsible for the whole range of activities when implementing a new feature. You should be able to look at a problem from the user's perspective and discuss abstract concepts with fellow developers. They expect each of their developers to do architecture, design, implementation, customer feedback, and bug fixing, rather than splitting these activities between several people. They thus put everyone in control of their own work.

Perks And Benefits


At think-cell, there are no deadlines and no scheduled meetings. A feature is ready to be released when you are convinced that you have implemented the best possible solution. Meetings take place as needed, with only the people that are actually involved being required to be present. At any time in the process, ideas, suggestions, and criticism from anybody in the hierarchy are welcome and are seriously considered.
think-cell encourages a healthy work-life balance. They do not work at night or on weekends
think-cell pays very competitive salaries and offers their developers EUR 130,000 annually following one year of employment. If necessary, they will go out of their way to help you relocate to Berlin, and will do what they can to help you acquire a work permit.


While you should be able to communicate effectively in English, knowing German is not required. German language courses can be arranged if desired.

Want to know more? Get in touch with us 👇
Show more

Title: Google Cloud Data Engineer | Banking Sector | Lisbon
Description:
Google Cloud Data Engineer

Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

YOUR ROLE

We are looking for motivated developers with experience in Google Cloud Data Engineer to join our teams in Lisbon.

In This Role You Will Be Responsible For


Design, build and maintain data pipelines using Google Cloud tools (BigQuery, Dataflow, Dataproc, Pub/Sub, etc.).
Create and manage scalable, high-performance data storage solutions.
Ensuring data integrity and security at all stages of the process.
Collaborate with data science and analytics teams to optimise the use of data.
Automating data flows and creating ETL/ELT solutions for integrating different sources.
Monitoring and improving the efficiency and performance of pipelines.
Developing solutions for handling large volumes of data (big data).


YOUR PROFILE


Google Cloud experience in Data Enginnering
Bigquery
Cloud Workflows
Cloud Storage
Cloud Functions
Dataform
Data Catalog
DataPlex
IAM
Vertix AI
Looker Core
Experiencie in building DataProducts


WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT WORKING HERE?


At Capgemini Portugal we have a flexible and dynamic work environment. Flexibility enables a better work-life balance and gives more flexibility to the employee to manage the working hours, as well if he works at the office or remotely, according with the company’s hybrid work policy;
We have local programs that promote people growth, reskill and new skills development (Career Acceleration Programs);
We promote an empowering environment with autonomy and peers' relationships among the top scores of our Monthly Employees' feedback;
Next to this, we also offer an attractive compensation package and benefits such as Health and Life insurance, as well as Referral program with bonuses for talent recommendations and other fringe benefits according with our partnerships in force.
Capgemini Portugal is an equal opportunity employer. We promote equality and dignity in all aspects of recruitment and employment, as well as employment offers and promotions made according with competence and ability or performance, respectively.


About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.

Get the future you want | www.capgemini.com

Apply now!

Title: Lead Data Scientist
HTML:
Chegou o momento de te desafiares a sair da tua zona de conforto fazendo parte de um grande projeto? Vem trabalhar connosco e potenciar ainda mais o teu desenvolvimento!

Integra uma nova equipa da Deloitte Portugal – AI Insights – onde trabalharás na interseção do negócio com analytics com os melhores especialistas em Data Science . Enquanto  Lead Data Scientist , terás a oportunidade de participar em projetos de advanced analytics que transformam as operações e o negócio dos nossos Clientes Financial Services, à escala global, criando e entregando soluções inovadoras de Portugal para o mundo. Procuramos perfis que combinem skills , analíticas de excelência, capacidade de entender o negócio e os processos, com o mindset de problem solving e orientação para a excelência do nosso serviço.

Na Deloitte nunca trabalharás sozinho e, por isso, oferecemos um plano de desenvolvimento de carreira com formação ajustada ao teu perfil e aos teus objetivos profissionais. Terás uma experiência profissional que te irá inspirar, ao lado de outros talentos como tu, a transformar o mundo como o conhecemos: a torná-lo mais humano, eficiente e tecnológico.

Estão reunidos todos os ingredientes para poderes embarcar nesta viagem enriquecedora e desafiante que é o mundo Deloitte?

O teu dia a dia e responsabilidades vão ser compostos por:

  • Foco no desenvolvimento e entrega de soluções de IA garantindo o sucesso no projeto e a excelência da entrega;
  • Liderar uma equipa de Data Scientists que trabalham diariamente para resolver desafios complexos do mundo real desenvolvendo soluções de advanced analytics que criam um impacto relevante no Cliente;
  • Participar em projetos de cliente desde a fase de framing do problema analítico, passando pela recolha e análise dos dados, pelo enrichment do dataset, pelo desenvolvimento e treino de modelos até ao deploy da solução;
  • Participar nas iniciativas de R&D onde há uma constante procura por inovação tecnológica da prática de data science e espaço de experimentação e cocriação multidisciplinar;
  • Análise de grandes quantidades de dados de diferentes fontes de dados;
  • Comunicação com profundidade técnica dos desenvolvimentos realizados.


És tu quem procuramos:

  • Mestrado ou PhD com relevante desempenho académico nas áreas de Estatística / Matemática Aplicada, Física, Engenharia Informática, Engenharia Eletrotécnica e de Computadores ou similar;
  • Experiência relevante de pelo menos 5 anos em consultoria de Data science envolvendo framing do problema, análise de dados, treino e deploy de modelos de machine Learning e sua monitorização;
  • Conhecimentos sólidos em analytics: machine learning, análise estatística, otimização e simulação;
  • Conhecimento e experiência em linguagens de programação com foco em machine learning e advanced analytics (tais como Python, R e Scala);
  • Conhecimento em SQL;
  • Conhecimentos técnicos em tecnologia Cloud (preferencial);
  • Experiência com casos de uso reais utilizando OCR, Computer Vision e Natural Language Processing para processamento de imagens (preferencial);
  • Excelentes capacidades de comunicação oral e escrita, em português e inglês, para públicos técnicos e de negócio;
  • Espírito curioso, com gosto por aprendizagem contínua e com paixão por resolver problemas complexos;
  • Gosto por comunicação, relacionamento interpessoal, trabalho em equipa e colaboração;
  • Organização, planeamento e orientação para a qualidade dos entregáveis


Desenvolve uma carreira à tua medida

  • Num contexto de trabalho diverso que permite um desenvolvimento e aprendizagem contínuos
  • Através de um plano de desenvolvimento de carreira personalizado (skills/ oportunidades técnicas e funcionais), adequado ao momento, às tuas necessidades e objetivos
  • Participando em projetos nacionais e internacionais, com dimensão e impacto relevante nesta área de especialização
  • Acesso ilimitado às maiores plataformas de aprendizagem online (Linkedin Learning e Udemy)
  • Oportunidade de formações e certificações nas mais recentes tecnologias, nomeadamente em tecnologias Cloud


Vive uma cultura de união

  • Uma cultura de inovação e excelência que nos torna líderes e percursores de tendências
  • Um ambiente amigável, de respeito, confiança, transparência e informalidade
  • Uma rede para a vida que te faz estar ligado ao melhor conhecimento ao lado de líderes e especialistas
  • Uma oportunidade para fazeres parte das nossas comunidades (de Tech, desporto e outros interesses) e para participares ativamente em projetos de responsabilidade social.


Sobre a Deloitte

Na Deloitte, nunca trabalharás sozinho. Vais integrar os mais variados e desafiantes projetos e fazer parte do nosso Global Solutions Center, onde poderás colaborar de forma integrada com outras equipas da rede global Deloitte. Terás sempre alguém ao teu lado para te inspirar, ajudar e desafiar a expandir os teus horizontes, enquanto exploras soluções tecnológicas diferenciadoras. Aqui, ao encontrares um ambiente dinâmico, colaborativo e humano, terás a oportunidade de desenvolver a tua melhor versão.

Além disso, as nossas equipas em Portugal têm projeção internacional, o que demonstra a nossa forte liderança global em diversas expertises tecnológicas.

Se tens interesse em explorar e desenvolver as tuas competências e fazer parte de equipas que desenvolvem soluções nas tecnologias líderes de mercado, então estás no lugar certo!

Somos mais de 5.500 pessoas em Portugal, das quais mais de 2.600 trabalham em áreas tecnológicas, a partir de escritórios e Digital Studios em Lisboa, Porto, Viseu, Coimbra e Faro e de polos tecnológicos em Braga, Setúbal e Leiria.

Keywords: Sobre a Deloitte; Consulting; Technology

Title: Data scientist Team Lead
Description:
We are looking for an experienced and motivated Senior Data Scientist – Team Lead to guide our data science team in developing innovative, data-driven solutions that address key business challenges. In this role, you will not only lead the technical development of machine learning models but also manage and mentor a team of data scientists.

Responsabilities


Lead and mentor a team of data scientists, fostering professional growth, ensuring high-quality output, and maintaining alignment with business goals.
Manage the end-to-end development and deployment of machine learning models, from data exploration to production implementation.
Ensure best practices in model validation, testing, and deployment are followed across the team.
Provide technical leadership on the design and development of machine learning models using the Python ecosystem (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow).
Use Apache Spark (PySpark) to handle and process large-scale datasets in distributed environments.
Lead the team in implementing robust and scalable machine learning solutions while adhering to software development best practices, such as version control and code quality.
Present findings, model results, and recommendations to senior management and key stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
Continuously monitor models in production to ensure optimal performance, adjusting as necessary based on real-world results.


Requirements


7+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning, data science, or a related field, with a minimum of 3 years in a leadership or team lead role.
Expertise in machine learning algorithms, statistical techniques, and model evaluation.Deep experience with the Python ecosystem for machine learning
Strong experience with Apache Spark (PySpark) for distributed data processing.
Solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and best practices in software engineering.
Exceptional leadership skills with experience in managing and mentoring data scientists.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to guide your team through complex technical challenges.
Experience with cloud platforms like Azure and tools like Databricks.
Show more
HTML:
We are looking for an experienced and motivated Senior Data Scientist – Team Lead to guide our data science team in developing innovative, data-driven solutions that address key business challenges. In this role, you will not only lead the technical development of machine learning models but also manage and mentor a team of data scientists.

Responsabilities

  • Lead and mentor a team of data scientists, fostering professional growth, ensuring high-quality output, and maintaining alignment with business goals.
  • Manage the end-to-end development and deployment of machine learning models, from data exploration to production implementation.
  • Ensure best practices in model validation, testing, and deployment are followed across the team.
  • Provide technical leadership on the design and development of machine learning models using the Python ecosystem (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow).
  • Use Apache Spark (PySpark) to handle and process large-scale datasets in distributed environments.
  • Lead the team in implementing robust and scalable machine learning solutions while adhering to software development best practices, such as version control and code quality.
  • Present findings, model results, and recommendations to senior management and key stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
  • Continuously monitor models in production to ensure optimal performance, adjusting as necessary based on real-world results.

Requirements

  • 7+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning, data science, or a related field, with a minimum of 3 years in a leadership or team lead role.
  • Expertise in machine learning algorithms, statistical techniques, and model evaluation.Deep experience with the Python ecosystem for machine learning
  • Strong experience with Apache Spark (PySpark) for distributed data processing.
  • Solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and best practices in software engineering.
  • Exceptional leadership skills with experience in managing and mentoring data scientists.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to guide your team through complex technical challenges.
  • Experience with cloud platforms like Azure and tools like Databricks.

Title: Energy & Utilities l Cloud Native Developer
HTML:
Company Description

At Devoteam, we believe that technology with strong human values can actively drive change for the better. Discover how Tech for People unlocks the future, creating a positive impact on the people and the world around us. We are a global leading player in Digital Transformation for leading organisations across EMEA, with a revenue of €1B. We believe in transforming technology to create value for our clients, partners and employees in a world where technology is developed for people. We are proud of the culture we have built together. We are proud of our people at the service of technology. We are proud of our diverse environment. Because we are #TechforPeople. Join our multidisciplinary team of Cloud experts, Designers, Business consultants, Security experts, Engineers, Developers and other extraordinary talents, spread across more than 20 EMEA countries. Become one of our +10.000 tech and business leaders on cloud, data and cyber security. Let’s fuse creativity with technology together and build innovative solutions that actively change things for the better.


Job Description
  • Making sure that customer requirements are understandable to the project team and programmers;
  • Drawing up and implementing test acceptance criteria;
  • Ensuring the evolution of applications and the design of new applications, through needs assessment.


Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree in the IT area or equivalent;
  • Over 6 years' experience in the field;
  • Experience in project management methodologies such as Agile, Scrum, Design Thinking;
  •  Excellent analysis and communication skills;
  • Knowledge of Jira and/or Confluence tools will be valued;
  • Fluency in English (written and spoken).


Additional Information

The Devoteam Group works for equal opportunities, promoting its employees based on merit and actively fights against all forms of discrimination. We are convinced that diversity contributes to the creativity, dynamism and excellence of our organization. All of our vacancies are open to people with disabilities.

Title: Senior Data Scientist - Ad Intelligence
Description:
Fraud warning:

It's common for scammers to create positions that look legitimate on other sites. To ensure your submission is considered, only apply for positions at Sensor Tower through our company website or through posts directly associated with Sensor Tower company profiles on sites such as LinkedIn, Indeed, BuiltIn or Hackajob. At no point will Sensor Tower ever ask for money, credit card, or bank account information to complete a job application. Communications received from Sensor Tower are only sent by e-mail addresses ending in sensortower.com . All Sensor Tower interviews will be conducted via phone or Zoom. At no time will a conversation be moved to an alternative email outside of sensortower.com or text. Should an issue arise that you feel we should be aware of, please contact us. Please provide your resume when applying.

To all recruitment agencies:

Sensor Tower does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Sensor Tower employees or any other organization location. Sensor Tower is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Sensor Tower will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Sensor Tower.

About this role:

Do you want to work for a company with a successful track record of profitability?

Are you looking to solve innovative data collection and processing problems at scale?

Are you interested in working on high-visibility, rapid-release products?

Do you value working with talented, experienced, friendly colleagues?

Join us in our journey to change how the world gains insights in digital marketing!

The Senior Data Scientist at Sensor Tower will leverage digital advertising along with mobile, desktop, and OTT industry knowledge to drive strategies that improve the accuracy and offerings for our Digital Marketing insights solution. This solution draws upon large-scale data (over 140 billion data records) and allows our customers to uncover insights like which apps or brands are advertising the most by channel and platform, which creatives are performing the best across certain ad networks, which ad network an advertiser is marketing on the most, and how much advertisers are spending in a channel and country.

What You Will Work On


Execute on the development of data modeling algorithms with a focus on: analyzing large sets of data, building models, ensuring data accuracy, reliability and consistency.
Develop, refine and bring data models to production. This role will work on models that are consumed by our end users, building internal tools and one time reports as well as working on the actual product that our users consume and rely on every day.
Consult on the use of AI to improve workflows for data extraction and classification.
Embrace a quick build, measure and iterate cycle to bring products to market and work alongside world class engineers, and data scientists.
Act as subject matter expert for our digital advertising.


What We Are Looking For


Degree in Mathematics/ Statistics/ Computer Science or a related engineering/ technical or quantitative field.


Min 4 years of experience as a Data Scientist in the ad-tech / mar-tech or data analytics companies, including the following experience in:


business intelligence, data mining, analytics, and statistical modeling disciplines;
analyzing and presenting data insights and code, communicating effectively with technical developers and non-technical marketing business partners, teammates and leadership;
implementing machine learning algorithms, working end-to-end on machine learning pipelines in production;
data engineering working on ETL pipelines, crawling APIs and websites, and automating outputs (report generation, workflow automation, Google Sheet interaction);
setting and meeting detailed timelines and expectations while executing projects, developing projects in a resilient way that anticipates future changes and interaction with other parts of the product;
data research, identifying the necessary edge cases that need to be tested in order to fully understand the data;
programming in Python or Ruby, utilizing AWS S3, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AWS Redshift or similar database technologies;
using Jupyter notebooks and one or more statistical visualization or graphing toolkits such as Excel, Qlik Sense or Tableau.


Technical Blog Posts

Read more about what our Engineers and Data Scientists do: https://sensortower.com/blog?category=2037363497

Products

We offer unique insights into the digital marketplace for mobile apps and app stores, consumer app usage, digital advertising, and brands with our recent acquisition of Pathmatics.

Customers

We serve small, independent and Fortune 1000 customers alike, spanning the mobile games, travel & hospitality, music, finance, CPG, and broadcast entertainment markets. We offer our suite of products on free, small-medium-size business, and enterprise tiers to make it accessible to the broadest range of customers.

Media

We are cited by the world’s leading news and finance media: The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, Forbes, Fortune, Bloomberg, CNBC, The Washington Post, and Reuters.

About Sensor Tower

Sensor Tower cultivates responsibly sourced market intelligence that provides visibility into the trends shaping the global digital economy. Our customers use these insights to help them make better business decisions.

Why Sensor Tower?

Our flexible work environment allows employees to live in greater connection with the people, places, and activities they love!

Our benefits for full-time positions include:


Flexible time off so employees can shape their time away from work.
Health and wellness stipend to achieve and maintain a healthy lifestyle through physical and mental fitness.
Monthly internet stipend and a one-time $500 home office stipend.


We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, and veteran status. We will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records. If you have a disability or special need, please do not hesitate to let us know and we'll do our best to accommodate.
Show more

Title: Senior Java Fullstack Developer
Description:
Company Description

We Cook iT is an international software house that delivers software development to its corporate customers by providing highly skilled, communicative IT professionals to build their customized products through outsourcing, nearshoring and turn-key projects’ solutions.

How do we differentiate ourselves? By investing in the professional growth and personal care of our software developers. We provide them with a premium service so that they can do the same for our customers.

Our talented team holds software engineers and sales experts, spread across offices in Europe and South America, and we represent a go-getting and driven company who aims to be an inspiring software house, knowing our future relies on IT.

We Cook iT stand for growth, support, dynamic, companionship and communication. Our head office is located in Portugal in the heart of Lisbon (Avenida da Liberdade) and we work mainly for the European market.

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced and talented Senior Java Fullstack Developer to join our innovative team in Portugal. The ideal candidate will possess strong expertise in Java programming language, regulatory technology (RegTech), JSON, API development, and business intelligence (BI). This role is integral to driving our technology initiatives forward and ensuring our solutions are both effective and compliant with industry standards. We offer flexible engagement options, including full-time, contract, or freelance arrangements.

Key Responsibilities:


⁠ ⁠Lead the design, development, and maintenance of scalable and secure APIs.
⁠ ⁠Implement and manage RegTech solutions to ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.
⁠ ⁠Utilize JSON for data interchange between systems, ensuring efficient and reliable data processing.
⁠ ⁠Develop and integrate BI tools to enhance data analytics and reporting capabilities.
⁠ ⁠Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement best practices.
⁠ ⁠Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, ensuring high performance and reliability of systems.
⁠ ⁠Stay updated with the latest technological trends and advancements to bring innovative solutions to the team.


Qualifications


⁠ ⁠Minimum Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
⁠ ⁠Minimum of 5 years of experience in software development, with at least 2 years in a senior or lead developer role.
⁠ Strong proficiency in Java programming language (knowledge of Python or JavaScript will be an advantage)
⁠ ⁠Demonstrated experience with RegTech solutions, JSON, API development, and BI integration.
⁠ ⁠Strong portfolio of completed projects showcasing technical expertise and problem-solving capabilities.
⁠ ⁠Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
⁠ ⁠Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Benefits:


⁠ ⁠Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
⁠ ⁠Comprehensive health insurance plan.
⁠ ⁠Flexible working hours and remote work options.
⁠ ⁠Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
⁠ ⁠Collaborative and innovative work environment.


Additional Information

If you are looking for a fast-paced multinational company and have a desire to be part of the exciting state-of-the-art projects across Europe, send us your application in English.

We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

Title: Rev-celerator Graduate Programme: Python Software Engineer
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products — including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more — help our 45+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‌ 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work™. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Our Technology team isn’t just one of the best in the industry. It’s one of the best in the world. And we’re proud of it. It’s our driving force, our engine. From building a new financial backend to creating an innovative app that millions of people around the world will use, there’s nothing (and we mean nothing) our tech team can’t do.

About The Rev-Celerator Graduate Programme 🎓

Are you a recent graduate eager to shape the future of finance? Ready to make a meaningful impact and bring innovative ideas to life? Well, the Rev-celerator Graduate Software Engineer programme is designed just for you.

First, kick off with a few weeks of bootcamp, where we’ll prepare you to jump into work at Revolut with workshops, lectures, and practical exercises to start developing your skills. After successful preparation, we’ll launch you into on-the-job training where you’ll be face-to-face with tough challenges, problem-solving, and tasks to own.

The Rev-celerator Graduate programme is now open to international candidates willing to relocate to our tech hubs in Poland, Portugal, and Spain. Get support on visa application (if needed), relocation cost and the first month of accommodation.

We’re looking for Python Engineer Interns who’ll write high-quality code, build complex novel solutions end to end, and help enhance our innovative financial systems.

Unlock your potential, explore new horizons, and step into the future of finance.

Up for the challenge? Let’s get in touch 🚀

What You’ll Be Doing


Helping our team to build APIs, ensuring they’re properly designed and can scale according to business needs
Supporting the creation of data pipelines to pull data from production services into our data warehouse, powering reporting, data analytics, and data science
Working within multidisciplinary squads to build new data models to provide this data to new flows and processes
Gaining commercial exposure to the most widely used OOPL, while expanding your SQL knowledge
Working alongside engineers with a deep understanding of distributed systems


What You'll Need


A portfolio of multiple coding side projects or open source contributions
To have graduated university in 2023, 2024, or 2025
A 2:1 predicted or achieved grade (or above)
University studies in computer science, maths, physics, or a similar field
A proactive attitude
Love for problem-solving
Fluency in English
To be an ambitious, quick learner with a results-driven attitude
Excellent communication and organisational skills
To feel comfortable working as part of a diverse team in a fast-paced environment


Building a global financial super app isn’t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that’s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We’re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That’s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.
Show more
